result.reason: Enhances credential management by allowing connections deeply nested in folder structures to inherit credentials from an ancestor folder, skipping intermediate folders that do not specify credentials.
result.approach: Modify the credential resolution logic (likely in ConnectionInfo or a helper class handling inheritance) to traverse the parent hierarchy upwards until a non-empty credential is found, instead of checking only the immediate parent.
